insert into i_finance (id, fund_name, payer, payee, amount, pay_time, kind, created_by, created_time, update_time, update_by, version ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update i_finance set fund_name = #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payer = #{payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payee = #{payee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, kind = #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, fund_name, payer, payee, amount, pay_time, kind, created_by, created_time, update_time, update_by, version from i_finance where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
